titles.title: Fort Gordon Child Development Center Expansion Act
Fort Gordon Child Development Center Expansion Act
A bill to extend the authority of the Department of the Army to carry out a child development center project in Fort Gordon, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Fort Gordon Child Development Center Expansion Act
This bill extends the funding authority for the military construction project related to a child development center at Fort Gordon, Georgia, until October 1, 2024, or the date on which military construction funds are authorized for FY2025, whichever is later.
